name: Merciless Cult
disclosureNotes: Their YouTube bio states that "through the use of AI, songs once written and forgotten on the hard drive of an old computer have come back to life" and that their songs feature "real riffs made by humans."
comments: Their YouTube bio states that "through the use of AI, songs once written and forgotten on the hard drive of an old computer have come back to life" and that their songs feature "real riffs made by humans."
